EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN VIRGIN ATLANTIC AND APPLY FOR A FREE SCHOLARSHIP TRIP DURING SUMMER!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Virgin Atlantic are giving YOU the chance to have free scholarship trip during the summer. The trip is a fantastic opportunity for 29 students to visit Free The Children's Adopt a Village communities in Rajasthan, India from 4th - 22nd August!
The scholarship trip covers everything from the minute you step on the plane, all flights, accommodation, food and activities. You will have time to assist in building schools, go on water- walks, meet our teams on the ground in India, engage in local cultural activities such as cooking and yoga and many more activities!
The application process consists of a 500 word personal statement and a creative piece to be submitted along with a teachers reference. The creative piece can be anything ranging from poems to photographs, songs, paintings, recipes and videos. Whatever YOU are passionate about!
If you want to apply or find out more information then click here!
Please note:
- This trip will take place between the 4th and 22nd of August, so please make sure you are available before applying,
- All you will be responsible for is covering any passport renewals, visas, vaccinations, health insurance and any spending money.
- The deadline to apply for this scholarship is on the 15th April 2016, so hurry and apply now!
Feel free to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org if you have any questions or queries.
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager - South West London
